entry.title: LawnchairLauncher/lawnchair
entry.summary:
No clever tagline needed.

Lawnchair 13

Lawnchair is a free, open-source home app for Android. Taking Launcher3 â€” Androidâ€™s default home app â€” as a starting point, it ports Pixel Launcher features and introduces rich options for customization.

This branch houses the codebase of Lawnchair 13, currently in development and based on Launcher3 from Android 13. For Lawnchair 9 to 12.1, see the branches with the 9- to 12.1- prefixes, respectively.

Contribute code

Whether youâ€™ve fixed a bug or introduced a new feature, we welcome pull requests! (If youâ€™d like to make a larger change and check with us first, you can do so via Lawnchairâ€™s Telegram group chat.) To help translate Lawnchair 13 instead, please see â€œTranslate.â€

You can use Git to clone this repository:

git clone --recursive https://github.com/LawnchairLauncher/lawnchair.git

To build the app, select the lawnWithQuickstepDebug build type. Should you face errors relating to the iconloaderlib and searchuilib projects, run git submodule update --init --recursive.

Here are a few contribution tips:

  • The lawnchair package houses Lawnchairâ€™s own code, whereas the src package includes a clone of the Launcher3 codebase with modifications. Generally, place new files in the former, keeping changes to the latter to a minimum.

  • You can use either Java or, preferably, Kotlin.

  • Make sure your code is logical and well formatted. If using Kotlin, see â€œCoding conventionsâ€ in the Kotlin documentation.

  • Set 13-dev as the base branch for pull requests.

Translate

You can help translate Lawnchair 13 on Crowdin. Here are a few tips:

  • When using quotation marks, insert the symbols specific to the target language, as listed in this table.

  • Lawnchair uses title case for some English UI text. Title case isnâ€™t used in other languages; opt for sentence case instead.

  • Some English terminology may have no commonly used equivalents in other languages. In such cases, use short descriptive phrasesâ€”for example, the equivalent of bottom row for dock.

Quick links

  • News
  • Lawnchair on Twitter
  • Website
  • XDA thread

You can view all our links in the Lawnchair Wiki.
